items.name: Rebreather
items.desc: Rebreathers can be found all over the map.

items.name: Electrical Tape
items.desc: Electrical tape can be found all over the map.

items.name: Light Bulb
items.desc: Light bulbs can be found all over the map.

items.name: Cigar Box
items.desc: Cigar boxes can be found predominantly around Ashika.

items.name: Self Revive
items.desc: These can be found predominantly in medical boxes around the map, these may also be found randomly as ground loot.

items.name: Wheelson
items.desc: The Wilson can be found patrolling the Tsuki Castle complex usually by the entrance to the main building.

items.name: Full Backpack With Each Slot Filled
items.desc: This is a simple task, simply add an item to each slot of your backpack and exfil.

items.name: Key
items.desc: Keys can be found dropped from AI, looted from boxes or found on the ground.

items.name: Ashika Island Mask
items.desc: As the name suggests these can be found around Ashika.

items.name: Unique Ashika Island Mask
items.desc: As the name suggests these can be found around Ashika.

items.name: Japanese Liquor
items.desc: Japanese liquor can be found randomly around Ashika.

items.name: AQ Laptop
items.desc: AQ Laptops can be found around the Koschei complex.

items.name: Blow Torch
items.desc: Blow torches can be found in all locations around the map.

items.name: Afak
items.desc: Afaks can be found in all locations around the map.

items.name: Ifak
items.desc: Ifaks can be found in all locations around the map.

items.name: Helo Commander
items.desc: The Helo Commander flies around the map in a helicopter. The best method to kill him is to capture a Sam site. This is most effective on Ashika.

items.name: Velikan
items.desc: Velikan can be found in building 21.

items.name: Cash
items.desc: Cash can be obtained from looting boxes and completing missions.

items.name: Large Medical Bag
items.desc: Large medical bags can predominantly be found in hospitals.

items.name: Nuclear Fuel Rod
items.desc: Nuclear Fuel rods can be found by completing a 'Secure Nuclear Materials' mission. Each mission will provide 2 fuel rods.

items.name: Dog Tag
items.desc: Dog tags can be obtained either by killing a player and taking the tag from the corpse, finding a dead player and taking it from the corpse or from killing the scavenger after he has been to a corpse.

items.name: Radiation Blocks
items.desc: Radiation blocker bottles can predominantly be found in medical boxes around the map.

items.name: Asprin
items.desc: Bottles of aspirin can predominantly be found in medical boxes around the map.

items.name: Vase
items.desc: Vases can be found on Ashika.

items.name: Stim
items.desc: Stims can be found usually in the medical boxes dotted around the map.

items.name: Gas Can
items.desc: Gas cans can be found in petrol stations around the map.

items.name: Enemy Operator Weapon
items.desc: These can only be found by either killing an operator and taking his weapon, or by finding a dead body and taking their weapon.

items.name: Black Mous Intel
items.desc: Black Mous intel can be found around the medical tents on the North East side of Rohan Oil.

upgrades.name: Unlock Black Mous Daily Urgent Missions
upgrades.description: Unlock daily urgent missions for Black Mous.
